TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AddInBaseAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AddInBaseAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AddInBaseAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Identifies an object as an add-in view segment of the pipeline.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Rebuild%2A> and <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Update%2A> methods, which maintain the store of information about available pipeline segments, use this attribute to identify an add-in view.
To construct the pipeline, the type in the add-in view that the add-in inherits from is identified by the <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.AddInBaseAttribute> attribute and is called the add-in base.
This attribute should be used only on types that activate the segments of the pipeline. Types that represent objects passed between the host and the add-in do not need this attribute.
## Examples The following example identifies the add-in base class for an add-in view pipeline segment.
[!code-csharp[AddInP1AddInViews#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1AddInViews/cs/Calc1AddInView.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP1AddInViews#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1AddInViews/vb/Calc1AddInView.vb#2)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets one or more add-in base types that a single add-in-side adapter can use to construct the pipeline.
Docs.value: An array of add-in base types.
